attributes.action: Stop sending money abroad and concentrate on the people of the United Kingdom
attributes.additional_details:
As of late the people of the United Kingdom have had to suffer adverse weather and are currently being forced from their homes, it is now time to demand of this Government that we cease or vastly decrease the amount of aid given to foreign communities and increase the money given to our communities. Due to lack of investment we are suffering from poor infrastructures which include adequate drainage, pot holes in roads and people living on the breadline.
 We need to get our own troubles in order and ensure that all people within the United Kingdom are treated equally.
